column4: when I'm using #modprobe ipg it works fine but when I type ipg in /etc/modules it does'nt work?
how can I make unbuntu autoload a networkcard driver at startup?
I have tried /etc/modules but i doesn't work
but I have a server installation
ya, but what driver do you need enabled. Do you know of a way to enable it yourself in a terminal?
wasn't the command to add the module permanently something like "sudo modprobe -a ipg"?
don't just run that, I am not sure, but read the man page.
that will add the module to startup.
